precondition: User is at the Windows XP desktop in a clean and idle state.
action: Right-click on the desktop and select 'Properties' from the context menu.

expected_results: Screen saver settings are displayed, allowing for customization.

precondition: User is in the 'Screen Saver' tab of the 'Display Properties' dialog box.
action: Select a screen saver from the dropdown menu and set the wait time.
expected_results: The selected screen saver is set to activate after the specified wait time.

precondition: User has selected a screen saver and set the wait time.
action: Choose additional preferences like 'On resume, password protect' and adjust 'Monitor power' settings by clicking the 'Power...' button.
expected_results: Additional screen saver and power settings are configured.

precondition: User has configured screen saver and additional settings.
action: Confirm your choices by clicking 'Apply' or 'OK'.
expected_results: The selected screen saver and settings are activated.

action: Navigate to the 'Power Options Properties' by selecting the 'Power Options' tab or accessing it through the 'Screen Saver' tab.
expected_results: Power management settings are displayed, allowing for customization.

precondition: User is in the 'Power Options Properties' dialog box.
action: Configure power management settings for the 'Home/Office Desk' profile, adjusting when the monitor, hard disks, system standby, and system hibernate activate.
expected_results: Power management settings are adjusted according to user preferences.

precondition: User has configured power management settings.
expected_results: The configured power management settings are saved and applied.
